create-table-queries.create-query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MY_STANDARD_SCORES_TABLE(ORGANIZATION varchar(255),INSERT_DATE varchar(255), INSTRUMENT varchar(255), PERIOD_END_DATE varchar(255), ESG_C_SCORE varchar(255),ESG_SCORE varchar(255),ENVIRONMENT_PILLAR_SCORE varchar(255), SOCIAL_PILLAR_SCORE varchar(255), GOVERNANCE_PILLAR_SCORE varchar(255), CONSTRAINT UC_MY_STANDARD_SCORES UNIQUE (INSTRUMENT,PERIOD_END_DATE))
create-table-queries.check-if-exists-query: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'

db.search-query: SELECT * FROM MY_STANDARD_SCORES_TABLE WHERE INSTRUMENT IN #universe#
insert-queries: REPLACE INTO MY_STANDARD_SCORES_TABLE(ORGANIZATION, INSERT_DATE, INSTRUMENT, PERIOD_END_DATE, ESG_C_SCORE, ESG_SCORE,ENVIRONMENT_PILLAR_SCORE, SOCIAL_PILLAR_SCORE, GOVERNANCE_PILLAR_SCORE)VALUES ('#Fields.ESGOrganization.Names.Name.OrganizationName.0.OrganizationNormalizedName#', '#File.DateTime#','#Fields.StatementDetails.OrganizationId#', '#Fields.StatementDetails.FinancialPeriodEndDate#','#Fields.ESGScores.ESGCombinedScore.Value#', '#Fields.ESGScores.ESGScore.Value#','#Fields.ESGScores.EnvironmentPillarScore.Value#', '#Fields.ESGScores.SocialPillarScore.Value#','#Fields.ESGScores.GovernancePillarScore.Value#')
